dublin_core.dcvalue: Most current insulin pumps include an insulin on board IOB feature to help subjects avoid problems associated with insulin stacking In addition many control algorithms proposed for a closed loop artificial pancreas make use of IOB to reduce the probability of hypoglycemic events that often occur due to the integral action of the controller The IOB curves are generated from the pharmacodynamic time activity profiles actions of subcutaneous insulin which are obtained from glycemic clamp studies
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:38:27Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2010-02-10
Journal of diabetes science and technology
Glucose clamp algorithms and insulin time-action profiles.
